member.name: T:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum
member.summary: A class that represents a spectrum of colors. After creating an instance, you can then retrieve a blended color within a range of [0.0f, 1.0f].

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a default ColorSpectrum instance with red color on either end.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.#ctor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Creates a ColorSpectrum instance with a specified color on either end.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.#ctor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Creates a ColorSpectrum instance with a start color on one end, and end color on the other end.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.#ctor(System.Drawing.Color[])
member.summary: Creates a ColorSpectrum instance with equidistant colors from the passed array of colors.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.#ctor(Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum)
member.summary: Copy constructor, Creates a new ColorSpectrum instance with data from the passed ColorSpectrum.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.Flip
member.summary: Reverses the colors and their positions of the ColorSpectrum.

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.Shift(System.Single)
member.summary: Shifts the internal position counter by a specified amount.
member.param: The amount to shift the internal counter by

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.CorrectPosition(System.Single)
member.summary: Returns the corrected position on the color spectrum
member.param: The position value to be corrected
member.returns: The corrected position value of range [0.0f, 1.0f]

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.SetColorAt(System.Single,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Adds a new color or sets an existing color at a specified position.

members.member:
Retrieves the color from the ColorSpectrum at a specified position.
The position value of range The maxiumum position value, used to calculate a value in [0.0f , 1.0f] range /// The opacity amount [0.0D - 1.0D] The color

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.ToLinearGradient(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the instance of ColorSpectrum into a LinearGradientBrush
member.param: The X coordinate of the LinearGradientBrush
The Y coordinate of the LinearGradientBrush

member.name: M:Aurora.EffectsEngine.ColorSpectrum.GetSpectrumColors
member.summary: Retrieves the colors and their positions on the spectrum
member.returns: Dictionary with position within the spectrum and color

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the EffectLayer class with default parameters.

member.summary: A copy constructor, Creates a new instance of the EffectLayer class from another EffectLayer instance.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the EffectLayer class with a specified layer name.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the EffectLayer class with a specified layer name. And applies a LayerEffect onto this EffectLayer instance. Using the parameters from LayerEffectConfig and a specified region in RectangleF
member.param: An enum specifying which LayerEffect to apply
A rectangle specifying what region to apply effects in

member.summary: Creates a rainbow gradient brush, to be used in effects.

member.summary: Fills the entire bitmap of the EffectLayer with a specified brush.

member.summary: Fills the entire bitmap of the EffectLayer with a specified color.
member.param: Color to be used during bitmap fill

member.summary: * Operator, Multiplies an EffectLayer by a double, adjusting opacity and color of the layer bitmap.

member.returns: The passed instance of EffectLayer with adjustments
